website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a drugstore vitamin C serum that won't stress your budget, this is the one to buy. You'll get twice as much as many competing brands for a low price.
pros: Combines vitamin C with hyaluronic acid, plant-based oils, and vitamin E to nourish, moisturize, and protect skin
Product is made in the U.S.A. by a company that doesn't do animal testing
Affordable, plus you get 2 ounces for the price
cons: Consistency is on the thin side, and feels a bit sticky
Some users report irritation after use
